passage_text: Benji is a variant of the name Ben (Dutch, English, and Hebrew) in the English language. Benji is also a diminutive of the name Benjamin (English, French, German, and Hebrew) in the English language. Benji is an unusual baby boy name. Its usage peaked modestly in 1975 with 0.010% of baby boys being named Benji.

English Meaning: The name Benji is an English baby name. In English the meaning of the name Benji is: Right-hand son. SoulUrge Number: 5. Expression Number: 22. People with this name have a deep inner desire for travel and adventure, and want to set their own pace in life without being governed by tradition.

Benji /ben-ji/ [2 sylls.] as a boys' name. Benji's name origin is Hebrew, and the name Benji means son. Benji is an alternate form of Ben (Hebrew): short version of Benjamin. Compare last name Banjo. Kreatif forms: Benbi, Binji, Bynji.

Meaning of Benji. English name. In English, the name Benji means-abbreviation of benjamin and benedict.The name Benji originated as an English name. The name Benji is most often used as a boy name or male name. English Name Meaning-abbreviation of benjamin and benedict. Origin-England.
